alert.note: Alert for Harding County; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 22 at 3:22AM MDT until March 22 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Quay County and Harding County. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on east to west oriented roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow and/or blowing dust will be possible, causing reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
